details.title: Static Map
details.description: Display a map using an image an a custom coordintes system

preference.name: map_url
preference.label: Map URL
preference.description: URL of the map to display inside the widget

preference.name: extent
preference.label: Coord mapping
preference.description: Range of coords used by the image

preference.name: initialZoom
preference.label: Initial Zoom Level
preference.description: Initial zoom level. From 1 to 22, where '1' represents the furthest level and '22' the maximum zoom level.

inputendpoint.name: poiInput
inputendpoint.label: Insert/Update PoI
inputendpoint.description: Insert or update a Point of Interest.

inputendpoint.name: replacePoIs
inputendpoint.label: Replace PoIs
inputendpoint.description: Replace all the rendered PoIs by the ones provided in the event.

inputendpoint.name: deletePoiInput
inputendpoint.label: Delete PoI
inputendpoint.description: Removes a point or more point of interests from the map.

outputendpoint.name: selectedPoI
outputendpoint.label: PoI selected
outputendpoint.description: A PoI has been selected on the map
